messages.title: I WILL WORK WITH THE WELSH ASSEMBLY TO DELIVER BETTER LIVES
Job guarantee for 18 - 24 year olds
messages.content: Tory mistakes in the recessions of the 80s and 90s must not happen again. It's vital that we keep up investment to create new jobs and apprenticeships for young people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protecting free bus passes and free prescriptions from Tory cuts is vital.
I believe strongly that we need to make life easier for people like Carers and others who work hard to provide valuable public services.
I will work closely with the Welsh Assembly to improve lives.

issues.economy: Tory mistakes in the recessions of the 80s and 90s must not happen again. It's vital that we keep up investment to create new jobs and apprenticeships for young people.

images.caption: Donna Hutton with Welsh First Minister, Carwyn Jones AM
Donna Hutton engaging with a young person.
